description: This file defines a Python class 'PostgresDb' that models a PostgreSQL database container configuration, including its properties, environment setup, and methods to retrieve connection details.

classes.name: PostgresDb
classes.description: A class representing a PostgreSQL Docker container configuration, including environment variables and connection parameters.

methods.name: get_db_user
methods.description: Returns the database user, either from the pg_user attribute or from a secret file.

methods.name: get_db_password
methods.description: Returns the database password, either from the pg_password attribute or from a secret file.

methods.name: get_db_database
methods.description: Returns the database name, either from the pg_database attribute or from a secret file.

methods.name: get_db_host
methods.description: Returns the container name acting as the database host.

methods.name: get_container_env
methods.description: Constructs and returns the environment variables for the PostgreSQL container, including secrets, env files, and AWS variables.
